As per the update from our team, please be informed that the refund of Rs.640.08/- was initiated on 16th December 2025 for the return of  2 quantities of ARACHITOL NANO 60K SUGAR FREE BOTTLE OF 5ML SOLUTION (PACK OF 4) . The refund will be credited to your payment source account within3-5 business days.      We appreciate your patience in the meantime.     For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.      Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. notes.body_html:
Hello Rajeev,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
 
This email is with regard to your order #656164591855538176-31410, we apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.

As per the update from our team, please be informed that the refund of Rs.640.08/- was initiated on 16th December 2025 for the return of  2 quantities of ARACHITOL NANO 60K SUGAR FREE BOTTLE OF 5ML SOLUTION (PACK OF 4) . The refund will be credited to your payment source account within3-5 business days. 

We appreciate your patience in the meantime.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 
 
Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!
 
Regards,
PharmEasy

notes.body: Hello Sneha Roy,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     We refer to your below mail regarding non receipt of reports      We would like to inform you that the samples were processing in our central processing lab Navi Mumbai and currently it is in under processing and once it released it will be uploaded in the PharmEasy application.     We understand your concerns and sincerely regret the inconvenience caused to you.  For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.   Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!  Regards, Suraj Gupta  PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Sneha Roy,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

We refer to your below mail regarding non receipt of reports 

We would like to inform you that the samples were processing in our central processing lab Navi Mumbai and currently it is in under processing and once it released it will be uploaded in the PharmEasy application.

We understand your concerns and sincerely regret the inconvenience caused to you.

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards,
Suraj Gupta 
PharmEasy

helpdesk_ticket.description_html:
Hello,

Order ID: 658768090446327808-41761

Having trust on PharmEasy's Express Delivery that you deliver medicines within 7 hours,  I ordered medicines today afternoon to be delivered by 10 pm tonight.

However, till now the order is not "out for delivery."

If you fail to deliver medicines today, I will be missing tonight's dose.

Such delay is not expected from PharmEasy.


Regards,

Pavithra

notes.body: Hello Pavithra,  Greetings from PharmEasy!  Thank you for your time on the call. Pursuant to our conversation.  As discussed, an amount of ₹75 will be credited to your PharmEasy Wallet (Refund Cash section) within 24–48 hours. You may use this amount for your future orders.  Additionally, as discussed, you have reported an issue with DEFCORT 6MG STRIP OF 10 TABLETS (1 quantity). To help us check this further, we request you to please share clear photos of the product showing the batch number and barcode.  We look forward to your response.  Regards, Grievance Officer HelpDesk
notes.body_html:
Hello Pavithra,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

Thank you for your time on the call. Pursuant to our conversation.

As discussed, an amount of ₹75 will be credited to your PharmEasy Wallet (Refund Cash section) within 24–48 hours. You may use this amount for your future orders.

Additionally, as discussed, you have reported an issue with DEFCORT 6MG STRIP OF 10 TABLETS (1 quantity). To help us check this further, we request you to please share clear photos of the product showing the batch number and barcode.

We look forward to your response.

Regards,
Grievance Officer HelpDesk

notes.body: Outcall done, Order is delivered, Offered Rs.75 in refund cash.      Additionally, the customer stated that there is a printing issue on the batch number of DEFCORT 6MG STRIP OF 10 TABLETS (1 qty). I informed the customer that it could be a printing error; however, the customer is not satisfied with this explanation. A request has been made to the customer to share clear photographs of the product, so that we can check the same with the concerned team.
notes.body_html:

Additionally, the customer stated that there is a printing issue on the batch number of DEFCORT 6MG STRIP OF 10 TABLETS (1 qty). notes.body:
Hello,

Of the 4 strips received Tablet Defcort 6mg having  Batch No.: 13251096A,
on 1 of the Strip Manufacturing details is printed  "upside-down" and on
the "bottom part" of the aluminium foil.

Whereas on the other 3 strips it is printed "upright" and on the "top part"
of the aluminium foil.

Photos attached herewith for your reference.

Would like to get clarity how that happen while all the 4 strips are of
same Batch.


Regards,

Pavithra

helpdesk_ticket.subject: Request for Immediate Deletion of My PharmEasy Account
helpdesk_ticket.description_html:
Dear PharmEasy Support Team,

I am writing to formally request the deletion of my PharmEasy account, as I no longer use or require your services.

I do not wish for my personal information to remain stored on your platform when the account is no longer in use. Therefore, I request that my account and all associated data be permanently deleted from your system at the earliest.

Please treat this request as a priority and provide written confirmation once the account deletion process has been completed. I expect prompt action from your end without unnecessary delays.

Thank you for your cooperation.

Disclaimer:
This email contains proprietary, business-confidential, and/or privileged material. The information contained in this e-mail is intended solely for the use of the individual to whom it is addressed. If you are not the intended recipient, you are hereby notified that any disclosure, copying, distribution or action in relation to the contents of this email is strictly prohibited and may be unlawful and request you to permanently delete this message and any attachments herein. You are requested to advise the sender, of your receipt of this email by return e-mail. The Company and its affiliates rule out any and every liability resulting from this or any other electronic transmission.

notes.body: Hello Sulagna,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     I understand your concern about account deletion.     Please be informed that we are unable to comply with your request and erase the data. We have to produce/show any or all transactions or interactions, past or present, when asked for by relevant Governmental authorities. However, please confirm if you wish to deactivate your account.     Let me inform you that once the account is deactivated then we cannot process any request or reactivate the account. Once confirmed our team will reach out to complete the account deactivation process on a registered mobile number to confirm if you requested account deactivation. If yes, OTP will be generated and will be sent to your registered mobile number. Once the OTP will be shared by you with the team, then will go ahead and block the customer's account.      Awaiting your earliest response.     Regards,  Habiba

Hello Sulagna,

Greetings from team PharmEasy!
 
This email is with regards to your concern raised about account deactivation.

As per update received from our team, our team member has called you  however you were non contactable. Please be informed you that, for account deactivation process our team member will called you on a registered mobile number to confirm if you requested account deactivation. If yes, OTP will be generated and will be sent to your registered mobile number. Once the OTP will be shared by you to the team then will go ahead and block the customer's account. 

Let me inform you that, once the account is deactivated then we cannot process any request or reactivate the account. Once confirmed our team will reach out to complete the deactivation process.  

So we request you to kindly reach us back if you wish to deactivate your account.  
 
If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.
 
For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.
 
Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!
 
Regards,
PharmEasy

helpdesk_ticket.description:
Hi Team,

I recently placed the following orders but I noticed that the quantities
delivered are different from what I originally ordered.

*Order Numbers: 651139170603687936 & 650521693633228800*

*Ordered Quantities:*

   1. Clopilet A 75mg Strip of 15 Capsules – 4 quantities
   2. Caldikind Plus Capsule – 5 quantities
   3. Biovas 40mg Strip of 10 Tablets – 5 quantities

*Received Quantities:*

   1. Clopilet A 75mg Strip of 15 Capsules – 4 quantities
   2. Caldikind Plus Capsule – 4 quantities
   3. Biovas 40mg Strip of 10 Tablets – 3 quantities

I am currently outside India, and these medicines were ordered for my
parents who cannot read or write English. Today, they asked me to reorder
the medicines and when I checked the order history, I realized that the
exact quantities were not delivered.

Additionally, I have noticed that whenever I place an order, some items are
either changed or canceled with the reason that they are not available.
Could you please clarify why these products are shown as available during
ordering if they cannot be procured?

Kindly check and revert regarding these discrepancies. I now need to
reorder the below quantities and I expect you to show some professionalism
to handle the orders in a way to trust your platforms.

   1. Caldikind Plus Capsule – 5 quantities
   2. Biovas 40mg Strip of 10 Tablets – 6 quantities

Thank you for your assistance. I can be reached @+91-9489463843 whatsapp
or +358-401682152 mobile.

Best Regards
Subramani

--

notes.body: Hello Subramani,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     I understand your concern regarding the missing medicines from your orders #650521693633228800-10707 and 651139170603687936-79063. Kindly note that PharmEasy gives an option to report for the missing medicine within 48 hours from the time of order delivery. You may check the below link for your reference:https://PharmEasy.in/help/medicine-healthcare-orders-43000348761/items-are-missing-from-my-order-43000187662     I have checked that your orders were delivered on 25th November 2025. The 48-hour timeline has been crossed for reporting the missing medicine. Hence, I am sorry we are unable to comply with your request for the same. I would have surely helped you if you had contacted us within the reporting timeframe. I apologise for the inconvenience caused to you.          Please note that at the time of placing the order, the requested medicine was available in limited quantity, and you were able to add medicines to the order. Once the medicine was added to your order, our Partner Retailer tried to arrange the medicine from every possible source. However, they could not arrange one. I apologise that we were unable to fulfil your medicine requirements for this order completely.     Please be informed that you may place a new order after 7 days for the required medicine that is not in stock. As our retailer restocks the medicines every 7 days. If the medicine is still unavailable, I would request you to reach us out. We will highlight your concern to the Partner retailer.     As checked, those medicines, Caldikind Plus Capsule and Biovas 40mg Strip of 10 Tablets, are available in the pin code 636101.     You can confirm the number on which you'd like to place the order, and we will be happy to arrange a callback from the relevant team to assist you further. Alternatively, you may also call us at 99929 99929 and press option "1" to place an order over the phone.    Awaiting your earliest response.     Regards,  Habiba

notes.body:
Dear Team,

Thank you for your patience in responding to my email. I understand your
policy regarding reporting missing medicines within 48 hours. However, I
would like to clarify my situation: we use PharmEasy to avoid the hassle of
visiting a pharmacy, and in my case, my parents are not familiar with this
process and they aren't educated. They only informed me now because they
realized they will run out of medicines in the next 10 days, which is when
I investigated the issue.

While I understand that policies are necessary for running a business, they
should also consider genuine customer concerns. I am not trying to
fabricate a story to claim money; this is a legitimate issue that needs to
be addressed. Due to this discrepancy, I have lost around ₹1,000 and I
don’t believe I should bear that cost for an error that was not mine.

It would be easy for me to reorder and escalate this matter to the consumer
court or raise awareness on social media about the poor service, but that
benefits no one. I expect this concern to be handled professionally and
empathetically, rather than simply referring to the rule book. If rules
need to be enforced, they should first apply to the employees who processed
this order to prevent such issues in the future.

I hope you can review this matter and provide a fair resolution.

Best Regards,
Subramani

Dear Team,

Thank you for your patience in responding to my email. I understand your policy regarding reporting missing medicines within 48 hours. However, I would like to clarify my situation: we use PharmEasy to avoid the hassle of visiting a pharmacy, and in my case, my parents are not familiar with this process and they aren't educated. They only informed me now because they realized they will run out of medicines in the next 10 days, which is when I investigated the issue.

While I understand that policies are necessary for running a business, they should also consider genuine customer concerns. I am not trying to fabricate a story to claim money; this is a legitimate issue that needs to be addressed. Due to this discrepancy, I have lost around ₹1,000 and I don’t believe I should bear that cost for an error that was not mine.

It would be easy for me to reorder and escalate this matter to the consumer court or raise awareness on social media about the poor service, but that benefits no one. I expect this concern to be handled professionally and empathetically, rather than simply referring to the rule book. If rules need to be enforced, they should first apply to the employees who processed this order to prevent such issues in the future.

I hope you can review this matter and provide a fair resolution.

Best Regards,
Subramani


On Sun, Dec 14, 2025 at 5:14 AM PharmEasy <care@pharmeasy.in> wrote:
Hello Subramani,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

I understand your concern regarding the missing medicines from your orders #650521693633228800-10707 and 651139170603687936-79063. Kindly note that PharmEasy gives an option to report for the missing medicine within 48 hours from the time of order delivery. You may check the below link for your reference:https://PharmEasy.in/help/medicine-healthcare-orders-43000348761/items-are-missing-from-my-order-43000187662

I have checked that your orders were delivered on 25th November 2025. The 48-hour timeline has been crossed for reporting the missing medicine. Hence, I am sorry we are unable to comply with your request for the same. I would have surely helped you if you had contacted us within the reporting timeframe. I apologise for the inconvenience caused to you.

Please note that at the time of placing the order, the requested medicine was available in limited quantity, and you were able to add medicines to the order. Once the medicine was added to your order, our Partner Retailer tried to arrange the medicine from every possible source. However, they could not arrange one. I apologise that we were unable to fulfil your medicine requirements for this order completely.

Please be informed that you may place a new order after 7 days for the required medicine that is not in stock. As our retailer restocks the medicines every 7 days. If the medicine is still unavailable, I would request you to reach us out. We will highlight your concern to the Partner retailer.

As checked, those medicines, Caldikind Plus Capsule and Biovas 40mg Strip of 10 Tablets, are available in the pin code 636101.

You can confirm the number on which you'd like to place the order, and we will be happy to arrange a callback from the relevant team to assist you further. Alternatively, you may also call us at 99929 99929 and press option "1" to place an order over the phone.

Awaiting your earliest response.

Regards,
Habiba

notes.body: Hello Sourabh,       Greetings from PharmEasy!  ​   With regards to your order #656982802247258112-17304, I am sorry to know you have not received your ordered medicine LEVIPIL XR 750MG STRIP OF 10 TABLETS  of 1 quantity. This is certainly not the kind of experience that we wanted you to have with our services. I apologize for the inconvenience caused to you.        I have highlighted the issue to our partner retailer. The issue is being investigated; this will take 24-48 hours from the time of reporting the issue. Once the issue is verified, we will try to initiate a refund for the missing medicines. We will inform you of the status once we receive an update from our partner retailer.     Once the refund is initiated, it will reflect in your payment source within 5-7 working days and PharmEasy wallet within 24 hours. Also, please confirm whether the order was delivered in intact condition.     I appreciate your patience in the meantime.     Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal

notes.body: Hello Priya,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     I understand your concern about account deletion.     Please be informed that we are unable to comply with your request and erase the data. We have to produce/show any or all transactions or interactions, past or present when asked for by relevant Governmental authorities. However, please confirm if you wish to deactivate your account.     Let me inform you that, once the account is deactivated then we cannot process any request or reactivate the account. Once confirmed our team will reach out to complete the account deactivation process on a registered mobile number to confirm if you requested account deactivation. If yes, OTP will be generated and will be sent to your registered mobile number. Once the OTP will be shared by you with the team then will go ahead and block the customer's account.      Awaiting your earliest response.     Regards,  Habiba

notes.body: Hello Manoj,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     With regard to your order #658715630440636416-80731, I am sorry to know that you have received medicines in a damaged condition. Please accept my sincere apologies for the inconvenience caused.       Please note that if we raise a return request for the ROMSONS AERO MIST NEBULIZER CUP & MASK SET ADULT SH-2074 COMBIPACK 1 NO'S , then the refund amount will be credited to your PharmEasy wallet. If you do not wish to get the refund in your PharmEasy wallet, then I request you to please set your refund preference.      Click on the link to set the refund preference: https://pharmeasy.in/account/profile/refunds     Once you set your refund preference, either PharmEasy Wallet or the original payment source, you may contact us again, and we will take the necessary action accordingly.  ​   Please be informed that we are unable to open the images that you have sent us. I would kindly request that you share the images of the product with the barcode (white QR sticker) and the batch number in the JPG or PDF format for further action.     Awaiting your response.     Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal

With regards to your order #657315501675712512-92444, I am sorry to know you have not received the medicine you ordered, SYMBULARDI STRIP OF 10 CAPSULES quantity of 1. Dear Sir

We wish to inform you that all the 4 strips as ordered has been recieved.

Really regret the unconvinience caused as this happened due to my grandson
who happened to open the packet and misplaced it.

Please cancel the ticket raised. And once again really sorry about it as I
have always recieved the order on prompt from PharmEasy till date without
any problem.

Thanking you and best regards

NarangI Bai Jain
notes.body_html:

We wish to inform you that all the 4 strips as ordered has been recieved. 

Really regret the unconvinience caused as this happened due to my grandson who happened to open the packet and misplaced it.

Please cancel the ticket raised. And once again really sorry about it as I have always recieved the order on prompt from PharmEasy till date without any problem.

Thanking you and best regards

NarangI Bai Jain

notes.body: Hello Chetna,   Greetings from PharmEasy!    I understand your concern with regard to the order Id #527768552209178624-88508. I apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.   As per the records, the order was assigned for a doctor consultation. Our partnered doctors tried multiple times to reach out to you for the consultation however, they were unable to connect with you.   I request you to place a new order with an active number, or you may upload a valid prescription to avoid doctor consultation. I am sorry to inform you that the order could not be processed further without the teleconsultation.   You may visit the link mentioned below for clarification.  https://pharmeasy.in/help/doctor-consultation-43000550954/why-was-a-doctor-consultation-arranged-for-my-order--43000487599     Kindly confirm if the registered number is active or not so we can arrange a doctor call on the registered number.   Awaiting your response.   Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal
notes.body_html:
Hello Chetna,

Greetings from PharmEasy! 

I understand your concern with regard to the order Id #527768552209178624-88508. I apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.

As per the records, the order was assigned for a doctor consultation. Our partnered doctors tried multiple times to reach out to you for the consultation however, they were unable to connect with you.

I request you to place a new order with an active number, or you may upload a valid prescription to avoid doctor consultation. I am sorry to inform you that the order could not be processed further without the teleconsultation.

You may visit the link mentioned below for clarification.
https://pharmeasy.in/help/doctor-consultation-43000550954/why-was-a-doctor-consultation-arranged-for-my-order--43000487599

Kindly confirm if the registered number is active or not so we can arrange a doctor call on the registered number.

Awaiting your response.

Regards,
Sandhya Nackwal

notes.body_html:
Hello Amit,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

We have received an update from our Logistics team that your order #656275173094457344-32603 has been delivered to you. We hope you have received the same today. 

Order #656275173094457344-52342 will be cancelled as per your request. A refund of Rs. 192.09 has been initiated to your account. Post initiation, the refund will be credited to your source account within 5-7 business days. Please note that Saturday, Sunday, and bank holidays are not included in this. 

Please note that the refund might not be shown in the UPI account and the same is credited to your bank account. Kindly check your bank account and wait till the above timeframe.
 
We apologise for the inconvenience caused to you. Your patience is highly appreciated in the meantime.

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels on the app or website listed in the "Need Help" section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Safe.

notes.body: Hello Ratan,      Greetings from PharmEasy!      I understand your concern with regard to the order Id #658900283369742336-91803. I apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.     As per the records, the order was assigned for a doctor consultation. Our partnered doctors tried twice to reach out to you for the consultation. However, they were unable to connect with you.     I request you to place a new order with an active number, or you may upload a valid prescription to avoid a doctor consultation. I am sorry to inform you that the order could not be processed further without the teleconsultation.     You may visit the link mentioned below for clarification.  https://pharmeasy.in/help/doctor-consultation-43000550954/why-was-a-doctor-consultation-arranged-for-my-order--43000487599  Kindly confirm if the registered number is active or not, so we can arrange a doctor call on the registered number. notes.body: Hello,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     I understand your concern with regard to the delinking of Amazon Pay details. I will surely assist you with this.     I would like to inform you that we do not save Amazon wallet credentials. Amazon Pay linking to an account is a feature of Chrome or any internet browser, which is opened by the app at the time of payment. In order to unlink the account, you can do this on the device by clearing the cache of Chrome or any internet browser.      To know how to clear the cache memory, kindly search on Google.      You can also check the following steps.   1) Open your Amazon app,   2) Click on the Settings button (on top left)   3) Click on 'Your Account'   4) Click on 'Login with Amazon'.   5) Click on the PharmEasy logo and then press the 'Remove' tab.     For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.​​​​​​​​     Regards,  Manisha
notes.body_html:
Hello,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

I understand your concern with regard to the delinking of Amazon Pay details. I will surely assist you with this.

I would like to inform you that we do not save Amazon wallet credentials. Amazon Pay linking to an account is a feature of Chrome or any internet browser, which is opened by the app at the time of payment. In order to unlink the account, you can do this on the device by clearing the cache of Chrome or any internet browser. 

To know how to clear the cache memory, kindly search on Google. 

You can also check the following steps. 
1) Open your Amazon app, 
2) Click on the Settings button (on top left) 
3) Click on 'Your Account' 
4) Click on 'Login with Amazon'. 
5) Click on the PharmEasy logo and then press the 'Remove' tab.

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.​​​​​​​​

Regards,
Manisha

helpdesk_ticket.description:
Hi, Did you verify whether it was the originally assigned phlebotomist or any reply he had sent for training? I had also highlighted the pain in left side which still not completely cured today. Also how do you ensure that this person wouldn’t be assigned again for my next booking with Thyrocare, because to my knowledge he is the only phlebotomist in this town? Regards, Sanjib Saha Begin forwarded message: From: Wellness <wellness@thyrocare.com> Date: 13 December 2025 at 12:37:03 PM IST To: kumarsanjib_2000@yahoo.com Subject: Re: Re: FEEDBACK: Your Appointment is Confirmed- Appointment ID- 744788917 Date of Appointment-12/12/2025 Reply-To: Wellness <wellness@thyrocare.com> ﻿ 
 
 
 Hi Sanjib Saha, Wellness Greetings! 
 
 We have registered your complaint with Id: VL730D4E Regarding hygiene protocols. We are in receipt of your booking through Direct Sales Associate ( VISIT APP ) for beneficiary Sanjib Kumar Saha for ESR,FBS,HBA,USTSH,VITDC,HEMOGRAM - 6 PART (DIFF),COMPLETE URINE ANALYSIS,LIPID PROFILE,LIVER FUNCTION TESTS,KIDPRO test and your appointment was on 12-12-2025 10:00 am. 
 
 We regret to inform you that assigned phlebotomist has failed to follow hygiene protocols during sample Collection. 
 
 Based on your feedback we have sensitized the technician and we assure you that corrective action will be taken as per company policy to avoid the same in future. 
 
 We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience and look forward to providing you with a smooth and hassle-free experience going forward. 
 
 Should you have any query or for further assistance please write to undersigned. Assuring you always the best of our services. Regards, Shruti Vaviya Complaint & Redressals Phone No. ‪+91 223090 0000‬ | WhatsApp No. 9870 666 333 complaints@thyrocare.com | www.thyrocare.com
 
 
 
 
 
 
 On
 Sat, 13 Dec at 8:29 AM
 , Grievance Officer <grievance-officer@pharmeasy.in> wrote:
 
 Team, 
 
 Kindly check if this belongs to us. 
 
 Regards, Grievance Helpdesk 
 
 ---------- Forwarded message --------- 
 
 
 
 From: Sanjib Saha <kumarsanjib_2000@yahoo.com> Date: Sat, Dec 13, 2025 at 1:56 AM Subject: Re: FEEDBACK: Your Appointment is Confirmed- Appointment ID- 744788917 Date of Appointment-12/12/2025 To: hello@getvisitapp.com <hello@getvisitapp.com>, wellness@thyrocare.com <wellness@thyrocare.com> Cc: gro@careinsurance.com <gro@careinsurance.com>, Grievance Officer <grievance-officer@pharmeasy.in>, PharmEasy <care@pharmeasy.in>, Deepanshu Bhatia <deepanshubhatia@policybazaar.com>, PolicyBazaar <care@policybazaar.com> 
 
 
 
 
 Hi, 
 
 Even after written reminder through mail trail communication regarding proper hygienic measures I had a very disappointing experience today morning when the collecting agent turned up almost half an hour ago and WITHOUT ANY MASK. 
 
 When I had asked him about the mask before allowing him to enter, he mentioned that he will wear inside, but he wasn't wearing anything...... again I had to remind him about the mask and then he said he forgot it in the bike and will manage with his helmet and in the middle of preparation he suggested to go down from 4th floor to bring his mask which I found already too late. 
 
 What kind of agents do you hire for sample collection that they think helmet can be used as a replacement for the mask? I never found such intelligent folks in Bangalore where ALL collection agents were very disciplined irrespective of the organization or hospital they belong to. 
 
 Also this agent was not wearing clean clothes, neither well-groomed and surprisingly, I noticed him keeping all used gloves in a side pocket of his bag; not sure what is the purpose of collecting such used gloves. 
 
 
I understand, it could be a regional nuisance; but that can't be an excuse as we depend on the brand name and can't put our health at risk due to such basic negligence, especially when other senior citizens are at home. 
 
 
 He called me form mobile number 7949106890 and I doubt whether any replacement person was sent in place of the originally assigned agent, because till now I am having a weird kind of pain passing through nerves in my left hand which I never experienced before.
 
 
 I recall during my previous appointment with Thyrocare booked through BEATO in July 2025 (booked through same mobile for my mother) when this Mr. Bidhan Sadhu called me prior evening, I had an argument with him regarding genuineness of PharmEasy in such location, because agent in Bangalore told me that they don't get access of customer's number unless one hour before appointment and next morning I got to know that Mr. Sadhu refused my appointment and hence, Mr Hritik Shaw had to come from a very distant place Raniganj, but he took all precautionary measures. 
 
 Also I would like to highlight that parameters of KFT in Thyrocare is different from other organization / hospitals and doesn't include basic salts Na & K, but generally all doctors look for three basic salts Na/K/Ca; not sure why such health package is recommended form CARE and it is a paid rider. 
 
 PS: Just a while ago I received SMS notification at 12:32 am that sample collected in the morning has reached the lab now. 
 
 Regards, Sanjib Kumar Saha 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 On Wednesday 10 December, 2025 at 09:02:32 pm IST, <hello@getvisitapp.com> wrote:

 Apologies for the inconvenience caused to you.

 Liver Function Test (LFT) 
 
 
 Lipid Profile 
 
 
 HbA1c (Glycosylated Hemoglobin) 
 
 
 Vitamin D3 (25 Hydroxy) 
 
 
 Additionally, we have checked and found that your appointment is reflected as confirmed. If you face any further issues, please feel free to reach out to us. We will be happy to assist you. 
 
Regards, Visit Health Support Team

 Sanjib Saha

notes.body: Hello Jay,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     I understand your concern regarding the modification in pickup address and mobile number for order #652654745378070528-66749.  ​I would like to inform you that we are unable to modify the pickup address or mobile number, as this facility is not available. notes.body: Hello Vivek,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     I understand your concern about account deletion.     Please be informed that we are unable to comply with your request and erase the data. We have to produce/show any or all transactions or interactions, past or present when asked for by relevant Governmental authorities. However, please confirm if you wish to deactivate your account.     Let me inform you that, once the account is deactivated then we cannot process any request or reactivate the account. Once confirmed our team will reach out to complete the account deactivation process on a registered mobile number to confirm if you requested account deactivation. If yes, OTP will be generated and will be sent to your registered mobile number. Once the OTP will be shared by you with the team then will go ahead and block the customer's account.      Awaiting your earliest response.     Regards,  Habiba
notes.body_html:
Hello Vivek,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

I understand your concern about account deletion.

Please be informed that we are unable to comply with your request and erase the data. We have to produce/show any or all transactions or interactions, past or present when asked for by relevant Governmental authorities. However, please confirm if you wish to deactivate your account.
 
Let me inform you that, once the account is deactivated then we cannot process any request or reactivate the account. Once confirmed our team will reach out to complete the account deactivation process on a registered mobile number to confirm if you requested account deactivation. If yes, OTP will be generated and will be sent to your registered mobile number. Once the OTP will be shared by you with the team then will go ahead and block the customer's account. 

Awaiting your earliest response.
 
Regards,
Habiba

notes.body: Hello Ravi,     Greetings from PharmEasy!    I understand you wish to return the medicine HUMALOG MIX 50 100IU CARTRIDGE OF 3ML SUSPENSION FOR INJECTION from your order #658709823875538944-35661. I am sorry to know that you have received medicines in a damaged condition.    Please note that if we raise a return request for the medicine, then the refund amount will be credited to your PharmEasy wallet. If you do not wish to get the refund in your PharmEasy wallet, then I request you to please set your refund preference.      Click on the link to set the refund preference: https://pharmeasy.in/account/profile/refunds     Once you set your refund preference, either PharmEasy Wallet or the original payment source, you may contact us again, and we will take the necessary action accordingly.     I am sorry to inform you that the images which is you shared I am unable to open, I would like to request you send the images again in JPEG or PNG format so that we can take further action.      Awaiting your response.     Regards,  Habiba
notes.body_html:
Hello Ravi,

Greetings from PharmEasy!  

I understand you wish to return the medicine HUMALOG MIX 50 100IU CARTRIDGE OF 3ML SUSPENSION FOR INJECTION from your order #658709823875538944-35661. I am sorry to know that you have received medicines in a damaged condition.

Please note that if we raise a return request for the medicine, then the refund amount will be credited to your PharmEasy wallet. If you do not wish to get the refund in your PharmEasy wallet, then I request you to please set your refund preference. 

Click on the link to set the refund preference: https://pharmeasy.in/account/profile/refunds

Once you set your refund preference, either PharmEasy Wallet or the original payment source, you may contact us again, and we will take the necessary action accordingly.

I am sorry to inform you that the images which is you shared I am unable to open, I would like to request you send the images again in JPEG or PNG format so that we can take further action.

Awaiting your response.

notes.body: Hello Sharada,     Greetings from PharmEasy!  ​   With regards to your order #657357979871641600-39781, the estimated delivery date is 16th December 2025.   I would like to inform you that the estimated date of delivery depends on the availability of the medicines and the delivery pin code. Also, be informed, PharmEasy will always try to ensure that your order is delivered at the earliest as we completely understand the urgency of the medicine.  As of now, the speed-up delivery feature is unavailable with us. Once the order is out for delivery, you will receive an SMS with the contact details of the delivery executive along with the 4-digit pin. Once the details are shared with you, you may coordinate with the delivery executive for exact timings.      You may also track your order from here https://www.shiprocket.in/shipment-tracking/ with the AWB number 35899336997434.  ​   For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.     Regards,  Manisha
notes.body_html:

notes.body: Hello Syed,  Greetings from PharmEasy!  Thank you for your time on the call. Pursuant to our conversation:  We have initiated a refund of ₹320 for the missing item, which will be credited to your PharmEasy Wallet (Refund Cash). You may use this amount for your future orders.  Additionally, we request you to kindly share clear photos of the LIVEASY Ortho Care Cool Eye Mask, including the batch number and barcode, so that we can get this checked accordingly. We also request you to share a screenshot of the error you are facing while using the PharmEasy application.  We look forward to your response.  Regards, Grievance Officer HelpDesk
notes.body_html:
Hello Syed,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

Thank you for your time on the call. Pursuant to our conversation:

We have initiated a refund of ₹320 for the missing item, which will be credited to your PharmEasy Wallet (Refund Cash). You may use this amount for your future orders.

Additionally, we request you to kindly share clear photos of the LIVEASY Ortho Care Cool Eye Mask, including the batch number and barcode, so that we can get this checked accordingly.
We also request you to share a screenshot of the error you are facing while using the PharmEasy application.

We look forward to your response.

Regards,
Grievance Officer HelpDesk

notes.body: Hello Syed,  Greetings from PharmEasy!  Thank you for your time on the call. Pursuant to our conversation, Rs. 320 is credited to your PharmEasy wallet. To check your PharmEasy Wallet balance, go to the accounts section and click on the Wallet section to see the balance amount. A Promotional discount of Rs. 50 is also credited to your PharmEasy wallet. This amount will expire on 11.02.2026 at 1 PM.    Further, we request you to share clear images of the item LIVEASY ORTHO CARE COOL EYE MASK - PROVIDES RELIEF TO STRESSED & DRY EYES - REDUCES DARK CIRCLES highlighting the PharmEasy barcode sticker (QR code sticker pasted on the product) and the batch number. Also, we request that you share the screenshot of the error you are facing while using the PharmEasy application.  We look forward to your response.  Regards,   Grievance Officer HelpDesk.
